Description: Unique identifier for each server telemetry log entry.
UTC timestamp of when the telemetry data was captured (5-minute intervals).
The Server Meshing configuration version running on the shard (e.g., Static_Mesh_V1).
Number of concurrent players connected to the shard at the time of logging.
Server Frames Per Second. KPI for "Game Stability". Target > 20, Critical < 5.
Average latency in milliseconds for player interactions (e.g., opening doors, inventory).
Binary flag (1 = Crash, 0 = Stable). Indicates if a 30k error/server crash occurred.
Unique identifier for the pledge transaction.
Anonymized identifier for the user account making the pledge.
UTC timestamp of when the transaction was processed.
Name of the digital item/ship pledged for (e.g., RSI Polaris).
The USD value of the transaction.
Current status of the payment (e.g., COMPLETED).
